headerDisplay: For instructions on how to prepare your BroadLink RM and Dyson Pure Cool Me to be used by this plugin, please look [here](https://github.com/jeremynoesen/homebridge-dyson-bp01#device-setup).

name.title: Name
name.description: The display name of the accessory in Homebridge and HomeKit. This must be unique per accessory.

serial.title: Serial Number
serial.description: The serial number of your Dyson Pure Cool Me. This is displayed in the Home app, but does not affect functionality. Leave blank to use a placeholder.

mac.title: MAC Address
mac.description: If you have multiple BroadLink RMs, enter the MAC address of the one controlling the fan. Leave blank for device auto-discovery.

interval.title: Interval
interval.description: This represents the delay between signals sent via the BroadLink RM in milliseconds. It is not recommended that you set this value lower than the default. You may need to raise it depending on the positioning of your BroadLink RM. Leave blank to use the default interval.
